body: At 14th level, a titan mauler may choose to gain the benefits of enlarge person when she enters a rage. While using titanic rage, she must spend 2 rounds of rage per round, and she becomes exhausted rather than fatigued when the rage ends. This ability replaces indomitable will.
name: Titanic Rage
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Barbarian/Barbarian Archetypes/Titan Mauler/Titanic Rage
